org.gvsig.raster.impl.store

Class Supersampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.impl.store.Supersampling
  • Deprecated. 
    Is being used the method getAdjustedWindow of Buffer

    public class Supersampling
extends java.lang.Object
    The requests to a RasterDataStore adjust the bounding box and the size in pixels to the source limits. The user can need a buffer that exceeds the raster dimension. In this case, the area that is out of the raster limits should be set to nodata values or transparent in RGB cases.
